name: Charted ( Uncharted Demake)
description:
Charted is an uncharted 4 demake. 

This is a remake of a small part of chapter 10: the twelve towers but don't worry there are no spoilers at all.

WADS or arrow keys to move and jump. space to shoot

Enemy's with green shirts make other enemy's immortal, kill them first.

tip: jump over enemy's to not die
